required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Restoration of Central Vision With the PRIMA System in Patients With Atrophic AMD
clinical_study.official_title: Restoration of Central Vision With the PRIMA System in Patients With Atrophic Age-Related Macular Degeneration

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of the PRIMA System in patients with atrophic AMD. Eligible subjects will be implanted with the PRIMA Implant. The subjects will be assessed with various visual function and functional vision tests at defined timepoints throughout the clinical investigation with the PRIMA System (Implant and Visual Processor).

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects with meaningful improvement of visual acuity
primary_outcome.description: Proportion of subjects with an improvement of visual acuity of logMAR 0.2 or more from baseline to 12 months
Number and severity of device and procedure related serious adverse events at 12 months follow-up

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects with meaningful improvement of visual acuity
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of subjects with an improvement of visual acuity of logMAR 0.2 or more at 6, 24 and 36 months compared to baseline
Mean improvement of visual acuity at 6, 12, 24 and 36 months compared to baseline

secondary_outcome.measure: Quality of life measured by IVI
secondary_outcome.description: IVI-Impact of Vision Impairment questionnaire (quality of life based on patient reported outcome of functional vision, participation in vision-related daily living activities and emotional well-being) at 6, 12, 24 and 36 months
Central visual perception with PRIMA at 12 months compared to central visual perception at baseline
Number and severity of procedure and device related adverse events at 6, 12, 24 and 36 months follow-up
Change of natural visual acuity without the PRIMA Glasses
Number of subjects with PRIMA implant placed according protocol

intervention.description: Implantation of PRIMA, Vision training, follow up

facility.name: Centre hospitalier intercommunal de Créteil - Service Ophtalmologie
Hôpital de la Croix-Rousse CHU de LYON
Instituto de Microcirugía Ocular de Barcelona
Moorfields Eye Hospital NHS Foundation Trust

reference.citation: Palanker D, Le Mer Y, Mohand-Said S, Muqit M, Sahel JA. Photovoltaic Restoration of Central Vision in Atrophic Age-Related Macular Degeneration. Ophthalmology. 2020 Aug;127(8):1097-1104. doi: 10.1016/j.ophtha.2020.02.024. Epub 2020 Feb 25.
